definition: lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic

sentences.english: Sitobion avenae(Fabricius)is a serious pest of wheat in China.
sentences.chinese: 麦长管蚜是我国小麦的重要害虫之一。

sentences.english: The predation and spatial heterogeneity on Harmonia axyridis adult to Myzus persicae were determined.
sentences.chinese: 测定异色瓢虫成虫对桃蚜的捕食功能和空间异质性。

sentences.english: The spatial patterns of fundatrices of kaburagia rhusicola Takagi were studied.
sentences.chinese: 本文分析了肚倍蚜干母的空间分布型。

sentences.english: Proposals on further research to plant killing aphid are put forward.
sentences.chinese: 并对杀蚜植物进一步研究应注意的问题提出了建议。

sentences.english: Method of using radish seedling as plant host to propagate peach aphid for mass rearing Aphidius gifuensis was studied in the laboratory.
sentences.chinese: 研究了用萝卜苗作桃蚜寄主植物繁殖烟蚜茧蜂的技术。

sentences.english: Sitobion avenae (Fabricius) is one of the most important pests of winter wheat in China.
sentences.chinese: 麦长管蚜是我国冬小麦产区的重要害虫。

sentences.english: Metasyrphus corollae larvae could feed on the dead Brevicoryne brassicae.
sentences.chinese: 大灰食蚜蝇幼虫可以取食死亡的甘蓝蚜。

sentences.english: The population dynamic of Myzus Persicae on Lilium Speciosum was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了百合上桃蚜种群数量季节变动动态。

sentences.english: The temperature is an important factor affecting on the population dynamics of asparagus aphid Brachycorynella asparagi Mordvolki.
sentences.chinese: 温度是影响芦笋小管蚜种群的主要因素之一。

sentences.english: Eristalis tenax and Episyrphus balteatus are predominant species in the local farmland.
sentences.chinese: 汉中地区农田优势种为长尾管蚜蝇和黑带食蚜蝇。

definition: boring insect/snout moth's larva (Aphomia gullaris or Plodia interpuncuella or Heliothus armigera etc), major agricultural pest
boring insect/snout moth's larva (Aphomia gullaris or Plodia interpuncuella or Heliothus armigera etc), major agricultural pest
